props.name: as
props.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwritten by asChild.

props.name: asChild
props.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.

props.name: color
props.description: Overrides the accent color inherited from the Theme.

props.name: defaultValue
props.description:
The default active value of the item(s).

Use when you do not need to control the state of the item(s).

props.name: dir
props.description: The reading direction of the combobox when applicable. <br> If omitted, inherits globally from ConfigProvider or assumes LTR (left-to-right) reading mode.

props.name: disabled
props.description: When true, prevents the user from interacting with the toggle group and all its items.

props.name: highContrast
props.description: Uses a higher contrast color for the component.

props.name: loop
props.description: When loop and rovingFocus is true, keyboard navigation will loop from last item to first, and vice versa.

props.name: modelValue
props.description:
The controlled value of the active item(s).

Use this when you need to control the state of the items. Can be binded with v-model

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the field. Submitted with its owning form as part of a name/value pair.

props.name: orientation
props.description: The orientation of the component, which determines how focus moves: horizontal for left/right arrows and vertical for up/down arrows.

props.name: radius
props.description: Overrides the radius inherited from the theme.

props.name: required
props.description: When true, indicates that the user must set the value before the owning form can be submitted.

props.name: rovingFocus
props.description: When false, navigating through the items using arrow keys will be disabled.

props.name: type
props.description:
Determines whether a "single" or "multiple" items can be selected at a time.

This prop will overwrite the inferred type from modelValue and defaultValue.
